1.description: switch to FFC and take 2 pictures

2.description: switch background effects to on and off. Repeat 5 times

3.description: switch automatic framing to on and off. Repeat 5 times

4.description: put autoframing on, background effect on, autoframing off, background effect off. Repeat 5 times

5.description: put autoframing off, background effect on, autoframing on, background effect off. Repeat 5 times

6.description: put background effect on.  switch autoframing to on and off. Repeat 5 times

7.description: put autoframing on.  switch background effect to on and off. Repeat 5 times

8.description: open cameraApp, switch to FFC in video mode,. disable autoframing and enable background blur,. minimize and restore camera app 5 times.
